idea-plugin.name: Rainbow Dash Progress Bar
idea-plugin.description:
The SUPER AWESOME Rainbow Dash Progress Bar plugin for IntelliJ!
Just like the Nyan one, but 20% cooler!

Based on the animated Mario Progress Bar by KikiManjaro (based on Nyan Progress Bar by Dmitry Batkovich).
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0 Awesome!
1.6.1 Rainbow Dashie just got a little more awesome!
  • She can now fly left and right
  • She has another "slower" version for your long build times
  • She is backwards compatible with IntelliJ 193
